description.p: You are a member of the privileged class of the Empire, given the esteemed position of oversee ing lands and collecting taxes. Whether born intonobility or having earned your position through hard work, you hold a crucial role in the Empireâ€™s functioning society. As an Imperial servant, your job may come with perks, but it also carries the weight of responsibility. You are tasked with upholding the policies of the Empire, a responsibility that many fear and few truly understand. Will you embrace the power and influence that come with your position, or will you question the motives of those in power and fight against the injustices of the Empire? Will you use your position for the greater good, or will you succumb to the corrupting influence of power?

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: One of your choice
Equipment: An Imperial insignia, an Imperial recommendation letter, a set of fine clothes, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp.

description.p: Living under the rule of the Empire was a challenging and often brutal experience, and those who served it are no exception. These individuals ranged from capable and loyal servants to ruthless officials who would do whatever it took to maintain their power and influence. While many drifted away from the Empire after its fall, you still maintain deep roots from years of obedience that are not easily pruned. As a result, you may be prone to maintaining loyalty to the Empire even after it has lost its former glory, or perhaps you harbor feelings of resentment for the role it played in your life. You may have an acute sense of duty and honor, or a ruthless streak that allows you to achieve your goalsby any means necessary. Whatever your disposition, your time as an Imperial servant has left an indelible mark on your character that will shape your decisions and actions for years to come.

setters.set: History, Intimidation, language and tool choice

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: The Empire taught the rigor that I want to forgot.
I'm a servant and I'm good at it.
I'm a perfectionist, I like things the way they should be.
Power without control is just a distraction. Everything in my reach must have my control.
The Empire was the greatest nation that ever existed. Do you understand the historical wealth we live in?
I am practical and direct, using force when necessary

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Charitable. After everything that happened, it's time to help people. (Good)
Mediator. The Empire still exists and its laws must prevail. (Lawful)
Sadistic. Deep down, everyone knows what the Empire is like and that will continue. (Evil)
Perseverance. The imposition of the Empire is gone, now we can be free with our wills. (Chaotic)
Pathfinder. There is a world beyond the Empire to be known. (Any)
Survivor. Only fools believe that the Empire has ceased to exist. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I lived the Empire, it's part of me.
My family are from the Empire. How can I abandon them?
Nobody erases the past, so why should I unlink?
I remember everyone who suffered and I have to do something for them.
I will still be recognized by the Empire, and thus return to its greatness.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I regret not taking more advantage of the power of the Empire.
The Empire was great, I blame myself for not having helped more
The Empire destroyed a lot of people, I contributed to that unfortunately.
I've done horrible things for the Empire, and it haunts me
I want to get away from everything that relates to the Empire.
The Empire deserved to fall, just like me.

description.p: Your years of service to the Empire allowed you to build a vast network of contacts still working within its various departments. You have at least one ally in each department who can help you obtain meetings, information, or simple items such as an insignia or official document (with no gp value and not magical) like a pass to enter the Empire. These old friends may owe you a favor, or you may owe them one, but the relationship is mutually beneficial and can prove valuable in a variety of situations.
